Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>So what's the story, kid? You going to
<clr:0000>take care of those pirates <clr:ffff>or not?
Near_0003: I don't want to get wet.
Talk_0101:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Chat_01>You're back already? Why the hurry?
Luck doesn't favor the hasty.<sp:0:4:0>Then again, I'm a generous man. If you
want to play again that badly...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>...Eh.<sp:5:1:0> Forget I said that. Come again
when some time has passed.
Talk_0102:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>You gotta wait, kid. Bugging me's not
going to change my answer.

Though I guess if you want to play that
badly... <sp:5:1:0>No, never mind.

Just come back later.
Talk_0103:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Notice>*sniff* <sp:5:0:0>*sniff* *sniff*<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>I'd know that smell anywhere! That's the
smell I dream about, sure enough!<sp:0:4:0>You've got a <clr:0000>roasted porgy <clr:ffff>in that pouch,
don't you? Give it!
Talk_0104:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Here to try your luck again? Got bit by
the wagering bug?
Talk_0220:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_01>So that's the game. Pick a chest, and
win a prize. All upside.

There is one catch—<sp:5:0:0>I have to cap how
much you play, or I'd go bankrupt.

Wouldn't want to shut me down right after
ya put me back in business, would you?

Didn't think so. Come back later if you
want another round.
Talk_0221:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Think>I grew up on the coast, so I enjoy a good
dip in the ocean. Soothes me.<sp:0:4:0>But getting rain-wet? That I don't like
one bit. So outta my way! I need to get
somewhere dry.
Talk_0105:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>But enough sappy stuff. This is the
Lucky Treasure Shop, where I run what
you'd call a game of luck.
See those treasure chests? Pick any one
of them and open it.<sp:0:4:0>Don't be shy. Crack one open.
Talk_0222:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I hate the way rain feels, but I don't mind
how it sounds. Reminds me of waves
crashin' on the beach.
Talk_0106:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Where do you think you're going?


Village savior or not, you gotta follow the
rules like everyone else.
Talk_0107:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>C'mon, bud. It's not that complicated.
Pick a chest—any chest—and open it up.
Talk_0224: <sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:TalkPositive>Hard to hear anything over the rain.
Talk_0109:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Thanks, kid. I have a real weakness for
roasted porgy.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Tell you what. Seein' as you were so
generous, I'll bend the rules and let you
play again.
Talk_0225:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_01>Well, kid? Satisfied?<sp:0:4:0>I gotta hand it to you. You wanted all my
prizes, you got 'em.<sp:0:4:0>Good on ya. Just give me time to restock
before you come back.
Talk_0226:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_01>Like what you got? Course you do.
With my prizes, there's no losing.<sp:0:4:0>If you want to take another crack, you'll
have to come back later.
Talk_0111:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>Hm! <sp:5:0:0>Hm! <sp:5:0:0>Hmmm! <sp:5:0:0>Fine.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>I'll take your word for it. I guess.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Ease>But I've closed up shop for the day,
so come back later.
Talk_0112:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>Sorry, but I'm out of prizes. I couldn't let
you play if I wanted to.<sp:0:4:0>It'll take some time to restock, so come
back later, OK?
Talk_0114:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>Well, look who it is. The kid who sent the
pirates packing.

The kid who rebuilt the whole village,
including this humble establishment.

When we met at the stable, I took you for
the fragile type.

Glad you proved me wrong.
Talk_0115:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>You're him, aren't ya? The kid who sent
the pirates packing?

The kid who rebuilt the village, including
this humble establishment?

I'd given up, ya know. I thought this town
was history.

Glad you proved me wrong.
Talk_0116:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_01>You might've saved the village, but that
doesn't mean you can mess around with
my stuff!
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Haven't seen your mug before. You new
around here?<sp:0:4:0>Listen, I got a proposition for ya. Involves
<clr:0000>taking care of some no-good pirates<clr:ffff>.
Whaddaya say—<sp:5:0:0>feeling brave?
Talk_0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>HAAAhahaha! I'm only kidding!<sp:0:4:0>A skinny little guy like you? You'd be a
goner before ya got out your sword!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>The <clr:0000>pirates <clr:ffff>I'm talking about, they're
nasty characters. Attacked <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>
on the <clr:0000>coast south of here<clr:ffff>.
That place was my home, until the <clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff>
forced me out.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>A peaceful village, <clr:0000>blessed by the sea<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0>
That's what it used to be.
Talk_0204: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>You get the prize on the right! Lucky man!
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>What is it, kid? <sp:5:1:0>You thinkin' about <clr:0000>fighting
those pirates <clr:ffff>I mentioned?
Talk_0118:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Well, I won't stop you. Go ahead and
crack open a chest.
Talk_0205:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughL_00>Rats! You get the middle prize—that's the
big one. I hate to see it go.
Talk_0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>HAAA! Hahaha! That will never not crack
me up!<sp:0:4:0>Just the idea of it! A little pipsqueak like
you against the whole throng of 'em!
They'd eat you for lunch!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Sad>If you know what's good for you, you'll
stay far away from those <clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff>—and that
<clr:0000>big ship <clr:ffff>they've got.
Talk_0119:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Mmm! I know that smell...<sp:5:1:0> That's roasted porgy!<sp:0:4:0>If I could, I'd trade him—the porgy for another crack
at the game. But I'm all outta prizes, so...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>

<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Sorry, pal... You cleaned us out. I couldn't
let you play if I wanted to.<sp:0:4:0>Give me some time to restock.
Talk_0206:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_01>That'll net you the prize on the left. Pff!
Take it, thief!
Talk_0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01>You chased 'em away? YOU?


Well, I'll be. You're stronger than you
look, ain't ya?

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_01>Last I saw, most of the buildings had
been destroyed...

But if the pirates are gone, maybe I'll
wait a while and then go poke around.
See the state of things.
Talk_0120:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS>Hang on. You can't back out before the
game's over.

C'mon, show some enthusiasm. Crack
open one of my chests.
Talk_0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Thanks, kid. That was the first good news
I've heard in ages.

<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Still, I doubt my shop's standing if those
pirates got to it...
Talk_0122:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice>I know that smell. You've got a <clr:0000>roasted
porgy<clr:ffff>! Gimmie!
Talk_0123: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Mm, that'll do nicely. You can play again.
Talk_0210:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You must be pretty happy, scoring that
prize for free.<sp:0:4:0>If you'd like it delivered to your place of
residence...<sp:5:0:0>too bad, I don't do that.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Oop, also. I'll take that rupee back.
